do?"},{"lineNumber":249046,"originalJapaneseLine":"安全な世界の構築って奴だろうがよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's to build a safe world, right?\""},{"lineNumber":249047,"originalJapaneseLine":"「油断してんなよ、ストロガノフ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't let your guard down, Stroganoff."},{"lineNumber":249048,"originalJapaneseLine":"可能性が万が一にでもあんなら、","translatedEnglishLine":"If there’s even the slightest chance,"},{"lineNumber":249049,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは安全じゃねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"then it’s not safe.\""},{"lineNumber":249050,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その証人がてめぇの目の前にいんだろうが」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The living proof of that is right in front of your eyes.\""},{"lineNumber":249051,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリスは自身を指さした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Keivris pointed to himself."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様に逆らおうなんて気が起きないような、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: People should not even feel like defying me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徹底的な教育が必要だからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s why thorough education is necessary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスは自分の理想とする人間界を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Keivris pictured his ideal human world in his mind,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その脳裏に思い描き、笑みすら浮かべる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and even a smile appeared on his face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まず最低でも開戦前の二割まで人数を減らす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "First, reduce their numbers to at least 20% of what they were before the war.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これが絶対の条件だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is an absolute condition."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奴らに一万以上の国家は作らせない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They shall never create a nation of more than ten thousand people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全て村や町の単位で管理する」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everything must be managed at the village or town level."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔法や技術の徹底的な禁止。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thorough prohibition of magic and technology.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知恵がつくのも怖ぇ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Knowledge itself is frightening.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 学術書や歴史書も全て燃やせ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Burn all scholarly and historical books."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「全ては奴らを俺様に逆らえない……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Everything is to make sure they can't defy me...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、逆らうなんて気すら絶対に起きない、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, so that they absolutely won't even feel like defying me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひ弱で従順な家畜にしちまう為だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To make them weak and obedient livestock."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのこと、なのですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "About that matter..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hm?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王ジル様の時代ですら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even in the era of Demon King Jil,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこまではやりませんでした……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They didn’t go that far..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……何が言いてぇ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What are you trying to say?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やりすぎではないかと感じております」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I feel it's going a bit too far."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stroganoff,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 初めてケイブリスに対し異を唱えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for the first time voiced opposition to Keivris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「確かに人間とは我らの敵。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Certainly, humans are our enemies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを滅ぼさんとするケイブリス様のお気持ち、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I deeply understand Keivris-sama’s desire to destroy them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂にも痛いほどよく分かります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: more than painfully so."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、奴ら人間の使命の一つには、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, I believe that one of the missions of humans is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我らの敵であることも入っていると儂は考えます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to be our enemy as well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カッ、てめぇの言葉は分かりづれぇんだよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, your words are hard to understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 簡単に言えや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Say it in simple terms."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間が強すぎるのは困りますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It’s troublesome if humans are too strong,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弱すぎるのも困る、ということでございます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but also troublesome if they are too weak."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔物にとって何の障害にもならない存在になると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If they become an existence that poses no obstacle to us demons,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我ら自身が戦うべき相手を失います……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we lose the very opponents we're meant to fight..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その先に待っているのは魔物の退化……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What awaits beyond that is the degeneration of demons..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間共は生かさず殺さず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Humans should be kept alive but not too powerful,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我らに刺激を与える存在でなければ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they must exist as a stimulus to us."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「つまり……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In other words..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間をそこまでイジメんな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're saying, don't bully humans that much,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: って言いてぇわけか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is that what you want to say?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……左様で」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Exactly."
"Ugh... guff..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐぁはぁはぁはぁはぁはぁはぁ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gwahahahahahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスはストロガノフを馬鹿にするように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Keivris mocked Stroganoff,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 腹を抱えて大口を開けて笑った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: clutching his belly, laughing heartily with his mouth wide open.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 金属同士を擦り合わせたような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A grating laugh, like metal scraping against metal,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 耳障りな笑い声が室内を揺らす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: shook the room unpleasantly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひーーーっ、笑った笑った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hiiiii, that was hilarious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんまり面白かったから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was so funny,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逆らったが殺さずにいてやらぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm letting you live even though you opposed me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ストロガノフ、お前案外馬鹿だったんだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Stroganoff, you turned out to be quite stupid after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どういう意味でしょう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What do you mean by that...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいか？　俺様はこれから魔王様になるんだぜ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Listen up, I'm going to become the Demon King from now on, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なら、まずすることはなんだ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So what's the first thing to do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 安全な世界の構築って奴だろうがよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's to build a safe world, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「油断してんなよ、ストロガノフ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't let your guard down, Stroganoff.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 可能性が万が一にでもあんなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If there’s even the slightest chance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは安全じゃねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then it’s not safe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その証人がてめぇの目の前にいんだろうが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The living proof of that is right in front of your eyes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスは自身を指さした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Keivris pointed to himself.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

chance,"},{"lineNumber":249049,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは安全じゃねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"then it’s not safe.\""},{"lineNumber":249050,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その証人がてめぇの目の前にいんだろうが」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The living proof of that is right in front of your eyes.\""},{"lineNumber":249051,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリスは自身を指さした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Keivris pointed to himself."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様に逆らおうなんて気が起きないような、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: People should not even feel like defying me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徹底的な教育が必要だからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s why thorough education is necessary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスは自分の理想とする人間界を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Keivris pictured his ideal human world in his mind,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その脳裏に思い描き、笑みすら浮かべる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and even a smile appeared on his face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まず最低でも開戦前の二割まで人数を減らす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "First, reduce their numbers to at least 20% of what they were before the war.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これが絶対の条件だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is an absolute condition."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奴らに一万以上の国家は作らせない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They shall never create a nation of more than ten thousand people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全て村や町の単位で管理する」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everything must be managed at the village or town level."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔法や技術の徹底的な禁止。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thorough prohibition of magic and technology.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知恵がつくのも怖ぇ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Knowledge itself is frightening.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 学術書や歴史書も全て燃やせ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Burn all scholarly and historical books."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「全ては奴らを俺様に逆らえない……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Everything is to make sure they can't defy me...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、逆らうなんて気すら絶対に起きない、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, so that they absolutely won't even feel like defying me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひ弱で従順な家畜にしちまう為だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To make them weak and obedient livestock."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのこと、なのですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "About that matter..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hm?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王ジル様の時代ですら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even in the era of Demon King Jil,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこまではやりませんでした……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They didn’t go that far..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……何が言いてぇ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What are you trying to say?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やりすぎではないかと感じております」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I feel it's going a bit too far."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stroganoff,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 初めてケイブリスに対し異を唱えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for the first time voiced opposition to Keivris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「確かに人間とは我らの敵。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Certainly, humans are our enemies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを滅ぼさんとするケイブリス様のお気持ち、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I deeply understand Keivris-sama’s desire to destroy them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂にも痛いほどよく分かります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: more than painfully so."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、奴ら人間の使命の一つには、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, I believe that one of the missions of humans is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我らの敵であることも入っていると儂は考えます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to be our enemy as well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カッ、てめぇの言葉は分かりづれぇんだよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, your words are hard to understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 簡単に言えや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Say it in simple terms."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間が強すぎるのは困りますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It’s troublesome if humans are too strong,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弱すぎるのも困る、ということでございます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but also troublesome if they are too weak."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔物にとって何の障害にもならない存在になると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If they become an existence that poses no obstacle to us demons,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我ら自身が戦うべき相手を失います……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we lose the very opponents we're meant to fight..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その先に待っているのは魔物の退化……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What awaits beyond that is the degeneration of demons..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間共は生かさず殺さず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Humans should be kept alive but not too powerful,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我らに刺激を与える存在でなければ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they must exist as a stimulus to us."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「つまり……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In other words..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間をそこまでイジメんな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're saying, don't bully humans that much,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: って言いてぇわけか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is that what you want to say?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……左様で」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Exactly."
"Ugh... guff..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐぁはぁはぁはぁはぁはぁはぁ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gwahahahahahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスはストロガノフを馬鹿にするように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Keivris mocked Stroganoff,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 腹を抱えて大口を開けて笑った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: clutching his belly, laughing heartily with his mouth wide open.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 金属同士を擦り合わせたような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A grating laugh, like metal scraping against metal,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 耳障りな笑い声が室内を揺らす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: shook the room unpleasantly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひーーーっ、笑った笑った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hiiiii, that was hilarious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんまり面白かったから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was so funny,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逆らったが殺さずにいてやらぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm letting you live even though you opposed me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ストロガノフ、お前案外馬鹿だったんだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Stroganoff, you turned out to be quite stupid after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どういう意味でしょう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What do you mean by that...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいか？　俺様はこれから魔王様になるんだぜ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Listen up, I'm going to become the Demon King from now on, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なら、まずすることはなんだ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So what's the first thing to do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 安全な世界の構築って奴だろうがよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's to build a safe world, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「油断してんなよ、ストロガノフ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't let your guard down, Stroganoff.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 可能性が万が一にでもあんなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If there’s even the slightest chance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは安全じゃねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then it’s not safe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その証人がてめぇの目の前にいんだろうが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The living proof of that is right in front of your eyes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスは自身を指さした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Keivris pointed to himself.
